p: The mixture of 1.0 mmol of amino alcohol [ethanolamine (0.06 mL), N-methylethanolamine (0.08 mL), or N-ethylethanolamine (0.10 mL)], 1.0 mmol of paraformaldehyde (0.03 g), and 1.0 mmol of >P(O)H reagent [diethyl phosphite (0.13 mL), dibutyl phosphite (0.20 mL), or ethyl phenyl- H-phosphinate (0.17 g)] was irradiated in a sealed tube at 80 °C for 20 min in a CEM Discover Microwave reactor equipped with a pressure controller.
